name: Dreamherder
description:
Combat playtest!

A/D, left/right to move

space to jump

LMB to attack

ESC to change difficulty or reset the game

Rectangle with a stick: You

Circles: Dreams

Squares: Enemies

Watch over your flock of dreams; they'll wander and graze when they can, and run from enemies when they can't! Enemies will attack after a short tell, during which they turn burgundy.

Red means dead! How high of a score can you get before you run out of health, dreams, or patience?

Try the challenge mode! I sure couldn't handle it! :)

And if you just want to relax with your flock, Peaceful mode removes the enemies so you and your dreams can walk around in peace.
